about.description:
The glibc package contains standard libraries which are used by multiple
programs on the system. In order to save disk space and memory, as well as to
make upgrading easier, common system code is kept in one place and shared
between programs. This particular package contains the most important sets of
shared libraries: the standard C library and the standard math library.
Without these two libraries, a Linux system will not function.

Kernel-headers includes the C header files that specify the interface between
the Linux kernel and userspace libraries and programs.  The header files
define structures and constants that are needed for building most standard
programs and are also needed for rebuilding the glibc package.
about.license: LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH exceptions AND GPL-2.0-or-later
about.summary: (CDT) The GNU libc libraries and header files for the Linux kernel for use by glibc

name: sysroot-cos7-ppc64le
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: sysroot-cos7-ppc64le
    version: '2.17'
source:
    -   folder: binary
        sha256: 72b69c9b5167cec0fa0ada58e013466207c09474dc80e29fb787b59142d75fcd
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/ppc64le/Packages/glibc-2.17-307.el7.1.ppc64le.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-common
        sha256: fbd6666b150575939ed12b682c5e29d2c8bc8fbcb87def073566d4378e6dd45c
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/ppc64le/Packages/glibc-common-2.17-307.el7.1.ppc64le.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-devel
        sha256: 06de9ca65035b1549bfee5fe344d92a94ea6a27bcb263cc10fdcc671255ec677
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/ppc64le/Packages/glibc-devel-2.17-307.el7.1.ppc64le.rpm
    -   folder: binary-tzdata
        sha256: a467bd14a5f0fec9e6227eae6aac92c155947a102e818c2bb62e2339e44a694a
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/ppc64le/Packages/tzdata-2019c-1.el7.noarch.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-headers
        sha256: d4ab419d81fad20282882d13539495c4bcad26bc714ffeb3754c165525017b2f
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/ppc64le/Packages/glibc-headers-2.17-307.el7.1.ppc64le.rpm
    -   folder: binary-kernel-headers
        sha256: df6867bcc614bf7f6561a983db25b2028fadb57d13ec781b5be9fab0de7354db
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/altarch/7/os/ppc64le/Packages/kernel-headers-3.10.0-1127.el7.ppc64le.rpm
build:
    noarch: generic
    number: 9
    string: hbe0c576_9
requirements:
    run:
        - sysroot_linux-ppc64le ==2.17
test:
    commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/lib/libc.so.6
        - test -f $PREFIX/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/sbin/ldconfig
        - test -f $PREFIX/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/lib/crt1.o
        - test -f $PREFIX/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/include/limits.h
        - test -f $PREFIX/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/include/gnu/stubs.h
        - test -d $PREFIX/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/share/locale
        - test -f $PREFIX/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/bin/ldd
        - test -f $PREFIX/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/lib/libc.so.6
about:
    description: 'The glibc package contains standard libraries which are used by
        multiple

        programs on the system. In order to save disk space and memory, as well as

        make upgrading easier, common system code is kept in one place and shared

        between programs. This particular package contains the most important sets
        of

        shared libraries: the standard C library and the standard math library.

        Without these two libraries, a Linux system will not function.


        Kernel-headers includes the C header files that specify the interface between

        the Linux kernel and userspace libraries and programs.  The header files

        define structures and constants that are needed for building most standard

        programs and are also needed for rebuilding the glibc package.

        '
    home: http://sources.redhat.com/glibc/
    license: LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH exceptions AND GPL-2.0-or-later
    license_family: GPL
    summary: (CDT) The GNU libc libraries and header files for the Linux kernel for
        use by glibc
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - beckermr
        - isuruf
        - scopatz
